entries.name: Axe
entries.description: An implement that can be used to split and chop wood, or as a weapon.

entries.name: Battle Axe
entries.description: Two-handed axe designed for combat.

entries.name: Bundle of Arrows
entries.description: A bundle of average arrows.

entries.name: Club
entries.description: A blunt weapon made of wood.

entries.name: Crossbow
entries.description: A mechanical bow.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: A small iron blade.

entries.name: Dueling Rapier
entries.description: A well balanced one-handed thin double-edged blade.

entries.name: Elven Arrows
entries.description: Finely made elven arrows.

entries.name: Fine Bow
entries.description: A well crafted bow.

entries.name: Flail
entries.description: A weapon consisting of a striking head attached to a handle by a chain.

entries.name: Halberd
entries.description: A two-handed pole weapon.

entries.name: Hunter's Bow
entries.description: A bow finely tuned for speed and accuracy.

entries.name: Knife
entries.description: A tool with a cutting edge.

entries.name: Long Sword
entries.description: A two-handed sword with a long blade.

entries.name: Mace
entries.description: A weapon with a heavy head on a solid shaft used to bludgeon opponents.

entries.name: Ragged Bow
entries.description: A heavily worn bow.

entries.name: Rapier
entries.description: A one-handed slender sharply pointed two-edged blade.

entries.name: Shillelagh
entries.description: A thick stick of oak.

entries.name: Shiv
entries.description: A makeshift weapon with a sharp edge.

entries.name: Short Sword
entries.description: A short single-handed sword.

entries.name: Spear
entries.description: A weapon with a long shaft and a pointed metal tip.

entries.name: Staff
entries.description: A wooden staff carved to be used as a striking tool.

entries.name: Throwing Dagger
entries.description: A light dagger that well balanced for accuracy.

entries.name: War hammer
entries.description: A large metal hammer, good for caving in skulls.
